name: MindSync
description: Experience moving robots with your mind.  MindSync is a utility app for Neeuro SenzeBand to connect with programmable DIY robots. MindSync allows a user to use his or her brainwave to control a robot.   Neeuro SenzeBand is an electroencephalogram (EEG) device, it picks up brainwave signal. The data is sent through Bluetooth to MindSync app on a mobile or tablet. The app analyses the data, measures the focus, and sends a command to the programmable DIY robot.  Currently mBot robot from MakeBlock is supported.  Start your experiment with Brain-Computer-Interface!
